mentions.candidate: Ajmal comes from a large family and is the eldest of six siblings. He is happily married and the proud father of two young children.

issues.health: He has recently returned from Darfur where he helped in the construction of water-wells and health care facilities.

leaflet.personalStatement: theCharityWorker Through his media work, he has hosted numerous fundraisers. Over the last 7 years, he helped to raise more than Â£10 Million pounds for charity. His favourite charities are Macmillan Cancer Support and Great Ormand Street Hospital. theFamilyMan Ajmal comes from a large family and is the eldest of six siblings. He is happily married and the proud father of two young children. He is a voluntary marriage counsellor for families, providing advice and support to couples who face difficult circumstances.

images.caption: Ajmal with children during his charitable work

leaflet.additionalNotes: D.O.B: 22.10.1971 Education: Arabic & Politics (SOAS, UoL) MA Comparative Religion (Birkbeck, UoL) Occupation: Campaigner and Broadcaster
